p: Scans were acquired on a Siemens Biograph 64 PET/CT. Patients were positioned in the scanner with a 3D laser alignment with reference to the orbitomeatal line. Thirty-minute brain emission scans were acquired 20 min after RAC or DTBZ injections; 15 min scans were acquired for FDOPA 75 min post-injection. All patients studied with FDOPA were pre-medicated with 150 mg of carbidopa to prevent peripheral decarboxylation.
